title: John Ford: Poet In the Desert
description: John Ford:Poet in the Desert is an uncommon biography of one of America's iconic Hollywood directors who made famous such actors as John Wayne, Maureen O'hara, Henry Fonda, and other legends. He won six Academy Awards for his Westerns; The Searchers, The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, and She Wore a Yellow Ribbon.
author: Joseph Malham
